flawed_nl_solution:
Eunice can plant a total of 3 pots x 3 seeds = <<3*3=9>>9 seeds in three pots.
So, only 10 - 9 = <<10-9=4>>4 eggplant seed will be planted in the fourth pot.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1, not 4. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
